name: Blitzllama
headline: A platform to collect and analyze in-product user feedback
description: Blitzllama makes it easy for product development teams to rapidly collect user feedback at scale. With only a simple SDK integration, teams can ask questions to their users within product journeys and get highly contextual answers in minutes. This empowers product teams to ship products that address users' real problems that increase user retention, engagement and reduce churn.

founders.name: Rahul Mallapur, Founder
founders.description: Building Blitzllama, an AI-powered product insights platform.

# Discover product insights faster and accelerate growth ðŸš€
Gather feedback with intuitive in-app and link surveys. Uncover product opportunities from all your surveys, reviews, and support conversations - all this made easy with our advanced AI.
[Book demo](https://www.blitzllama.com/<https:/calendly.com/blitzllama/blitz>)
[Get started for free](https://www.blitzllama.com/<https:/dashboard.blitzllama.com/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2e6_free-starter-credit-free.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2d3_YC-backed.png)
Trusted by leading tech companies
![caratlane_logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe39d_caratlane.svg)![motilal oswal](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe29d_motilal.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1c8_Smallcase.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1c5_Halan.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe29e_Kissht-ring.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1d6_bharatpe.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe29f_Rush%20gaming%20by%20hike.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1d1_Group%201000006760.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1d5_kaagaz.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1c4_Group%201000006675.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2a1_kiwi-card.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2a3_meddy-helium-health.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2a4_hrone.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe1d4_PlumHQ.svg)
Try our AI-powered platform to collect and analyze feedback
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe33f_Vector%203185.svg)
Pulse
Understand how customers experience your product with Pulse
![in-product-surveys](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe3ae_in-product-surveys.avif)
**In-Product Surveys**
Run targeted surveys right in your product and capture your usersâ€™ real-time insights.
[Read moreâ†—](https://www.blitzllama.com/</in-product-feedback>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe35c_actionable-insights.svg)
**Actionable Insights**
Turn responses into summaries and actionable opportunities in real-time.
[Read moreâ†—](https://www.blitzllama.com/</ai-analysis>)
![prototype-tests](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe35e_prototype-tests.svg)
**Prototype Tests**
Gain pre-release insights to de-risk product launches and minimize engineering iterations.
[Read moreâ†—](https://www.blitzllama.com/</concept-tests>)
[Read moreâ†—](https://www.blitzllama.com/</pulse>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe340_Group%201000007884.svg)
Eureka
**Automatically discover insights & opportunities from all customer feedback with Eureka**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f0_Ellipse%205180.svg)
Search
Discover relevant insights with semantic search, auto-summarize and save critical searches for quick access.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f2_Group%201000007658.svg)
Prioritise
Automated categorization of feedback into company-aligned topics, revealing complaints and improvements for prioritization.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f1_Group.svg)
Reports
Get alerts on new trends and anomalies. Weekly and monthly reports are automatically generated for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe341_multi-channel-feedback-insights.svg)
[Read more â†—](https://www.blitzllama.com/</eureka>)
Connect all sources of feedback
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe317_upload-csv.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe316_sync-slack.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe315_sync-app-store-reviews.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe310_sync-playstore-reviews.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe314_connect-intercom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe313_connect-api.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe311_connect-zendesk.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe312_connect-freshchat.svg)
Blitzllama seamlessly integrates with Play Store and App Store reviews, and survey responses. Take advantage of our CSV importer for the yet unsupported tools.
Teams love us because
35 hrs
Saved per week with AI-analysis
40%
Savings on feedback tools & employee costs
10x
Response rates
60%
Higher quality of feedback
Collect feedback and unlock product insights faster to drive growth!
[Get started for free](https://www.blitzllama.com/<https:/dashboard.blitzllama.com/signup>)
Move faster with feedback collection and analysis in one place 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30f_quick-feedback.svg)
Collect feedback in minutes
Create surveys in a few clicks and start gathering responses within minutes. Achieve high response rates of around 35%.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30a_ask-targetted%20questions.svg)
Ask the right users at the right time
Trigger in-product surveys to specific users based on who they are and what actions they take in your product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30b_easy-prioritization.svg)
Easier prioritization
A single system of categorization across surveys, support conversations, and other customer feedback data makes product decisions more efficient.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f6_consolidate-feedback.svg)
Access all feedback in one place
Feedback is annotated with intent, emotion, and sentiment, and made accessible through an advanced, semantically powerful search.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f5_seemless-integration.svg)
Seamless integrations
Eliminate data silos and reduce manual work with 30+ integrations that sync data across your data stack, from analytics to support tools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30d_anomaly-alerts.svg)
Alerts on new patterns
Receive real-time alerts via Slack and email on emerging patterns and anomalies.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30e_dedicated-support.svg)
Dedicated support
Blitzllama provides onboarding and training support, along with immediate support over chat support, Slack and calls.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30c_SOC2-compliant.svg)
Unrivaled security
Blitzllama is SOC2 Type II certified. All data is encrypted in transit and in storage.
Capture Feedback
Consolidate Feedback
## Hear from our customers
See what our customers say

Effortless insights for data-driven decisions.

Principal Product Manager

We wholeheartedly recommend Blitzllama to any organisation seeking to unlock the full potential of their user feedback loop"

Senior UX Researcher
![RushGaming_Udita](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe39c_image%20246.avif)

Senior Product Manager
![Vahan_John](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe391_john-manjila.avif)

"Blitzllama has become an indispensable ally for FloBiz. We use it extensively for evaluating new product opportunities and refining existing features. Before Blitzllama, navigating user insights was complex due to limitations of code instrumentation and user drop-offs in surveys conducted through external platforms like Google Forms. Blitzllamaâ€™s intuitive in-app surveys simplified the process, reducing time-to-insight for our Product, Research, and Growth teams."

VP of Product

"Blitzllama's insight-driven platform has been a game-changer for Kaagaz. It's not just about collecting feedback; it's about understanding the depth of our users' experiences. Move faster with feedback collection and analysis in one place 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30f_quick-feedback.svg)
Collect feedback in minutes
Create surveys in a few clicks and start gathering responses within minutes. Achieve high response rates of around 35%.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30a_ask-targetted%20questions.svg)
Ask the right users at the right time
Trigger in-product surveys to specific users based on who they are and what actions they take in your product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30b_easy-prioritization.svg)
Easier prioritization
A single system of categorization across surveys, support conversations, and other customer feedback data makes product decisions more efficient.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f6_consolidate-feedback.svg)
Access all feedback in one place
Feedback is annotated with intent, emotion, and sentiment, and made accessible through an advanced, semantically powerful search.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe2f5_seemless-integration.svg)
Seamless integrations
Eliminate data silos and reduce manual work with 30+ integrations that sync data across your data stack, from analytics to support tools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30d_anomaly-alerts.svg)
Alerts on new patterns
Receive real-time alerts via Slack and email on emerging patterns and anomalies.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30e_dedicated-support.svg)
Dedicated support
Blitzllama provides onboarding and training support, along with immediate support over chat support, Slack and calls.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6734e78d4ffb0feb6cffde7e/6734e78e4ffb0feb6cffe30c_SOC2-compliant.svg)
Unrivaled security
Blitzllama is SOC2 Type II certified. All data is encrypted in transit and in storage.

generated_description:
**Blitzllama: Revolutionizing User Feedback for Product Teams**

Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch W22, Blitzllama is a startup based in Bengaluru, India, that has rapidly established itself as a key players in the SaaS space. With a lean team of seven, Blitzllama is focused on empowering product development teams to collect and analyze in-product user feedback efficiently.

The mission? To give product teams the tools they need to understand their users better, ensuring they ship products that genuinely address user needs. Their platform simplifies the feedback process via an SDK, allowing teams to ask direct questions within product journeys and receive contextual answers almost instantly. This mechanism not only enhances user retention and engagement but also significantly reduces churn.

At the heart of Blitzllama's offerings are two standout products:

1. **Pulse:** This tool enables teams to run in-product surveys and gather actionable insights quickly. It focuses on understanding user experiences with real-time feedback.

2. **Eureka:** This product acts as a comprehensive feedback unifier, automatically discovering insights from various customer feedback sources and making it easier to prioritize and report on this information.

As of now, Blitzllama has made headlines by achieving SOC 2 Type II certification, reinforcing its commitment to security and data integrity.

Trusted by notable companies including CaratLane, Motilal Oswal, and others, itâ€™s gaining recognition for drastically improving response rates and enhancing the quality of feedback. Users appreciate the seamless integration Blitzllama provides, bringing multiple feedback channels together into one platform, allowing product teams to act on insights faster than ever.

Blitzllamaâ€™s customer-centric approach, combined with their advanced AI capabilities, positions them as an indispensable ally for businesses looking to harness the voice of their customers. Itâ€™s a promising tool for anyone committed to making data-driven decisions in product development. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [Blitzllama](https://www.blitzllama.com/).
